description: Manages static NATs on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

vm_guest_ip.description: VM guest NIC secondary IP address for the static NAT.

domain.description: Domain the static NAT is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

network.description: Network the IP address is related to.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

vm.description: Name of virtual machine which we make the static NAT for. Required if C(state=present).

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the static NAT is related to.

account.description: Account the static NAT is related to.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the virtual machine is in. If not set, default zone is used.

ip_address.description: Public IP address the static NAT is assigned to.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.
